description.value:
List of fields to include/ exclude when we get the data from choices, references for each field on the tables. 
Note: certain fields may need to be added to the exclude list if we are getting access violations.
description.display_value:
List of fields to include/ exclude when we get the data from choices, references for each field on the tables. 
Note: certain fields may need to be added to the exclude list if we are getting access violations.

            "sn_esign_document",
            "sn_esign_esignature_configuration",
        ];
    },

    checkField: function(array, field) {
        if (array && Array.isArray(array)) {
            if (field !== undefined && field !== null) {
                return array.includes(field);
            }
        }
        return false;
    },

    getMandatoryFields: function(table, record) {
        var fieldsNotToClear = this.fieldsThatCanNotBeCleared;

        var ruleGR = new GlideRecord('sys_data_policy_rule');
        ruleGR.addQuery('table', table);
        ruleGR.addQuery('mandatory', true);
        ruleGR.query();

        while (ruleGR.next()) {
            var query = ruleGR.sys_data_policy.conditions;
			
			var recordGR = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
			recordGR.addQuery('sys_id', record);
			if(query){
				recordGR.addEncodedQuery(query);
			}
			recordGR.query();
			
			if(recordGR.next()){
				fieldsNotToClear.push(ruleGR.getValue('field'));
			}
        }

        var dictionaryGR = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
        dictionaryGR.addQuery('name', table);
        dictionaryGR.addQuery('mandatory', true);
        dictionaryGR.addQuery('active', true);
        dictionaryGR.query();

        while (dictionaryGR.next()) {
            fieldsNotToClear.push(dictionaryGR.getValue('element'));
        }

		return fieldsNotToClear;
    },
    type: "TenonListFIeldsToExclude",
};

        ];
    },

    checkField: function(array, field) {
        if (array && Array.isArray(array)) {
            if (field !== undefined && field !== null) {
                return array.includes(field);
            }
        }
        return false;
    },

    getMandatoryFields: function(table, record) {
        var fieldsNotToClear = this.fieldsThatCanNotBeCleared;

        var ruleGR = new GlideRecord('sys_data_policy_rule');
        ruleGR.addQuery('table', table);
        ruleGR.addQuery('mandatory', true);
        ruleGR.query();

        while (ruleGR.next()) {
            var query = ruleGR.sys_data_policy.conditions;
			
			var recordGR = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
			recordGR.addQuery('sys_id', record);
			if(query){
				recordGR.addEncodedQuery(query);
			}
			recordGR.query();
			
			if(recordGR.next()){
				fieldsNotToClear.push(ruleGR.getValue('field'));
			}
        }

        var dictionaryGR = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
        dictionaryGR.addQuery('name', table);
        dictionaryGR.addQuery('mandatory', true);
        dictionaryGR.addQuery('active', true);
        dictionaryGR.query();

        while (dictionaryGR.next()) {
            fieldsNotToClear.push(dictionaryGR.getValue('element'));
        }

		return fieldsNotToClear;
    },
    type: "TenonListFIeldsToExclude",
};

    checkField: function(array, field) {
        if (array && Array.isArray(array)) {
            if (field !== undefined && field !== null) {
                return array.includes(field);
            }
        }
        return false;
    },

    getMandatoryFields: function(table, record) {
        var fieldsNotToClear = this.fieldsThatCanNotBeCleared;

        var ruleGR = new GlideRecord('sys_data_policy_rule');
        ruleGR.addQuery('table', table);
        ruleGR.addQuery('mandatory', true);
        ruleGR.query();

        while (ruleGR.next()) {
            var query = ruleGR.sys_data_policy.conditions;
			
			var recordGR = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
			recordGR.addQuery('sys_id', record);
			if(query){
				recordGR.addEncodedQuery(query);
			}
			recordGR.query();
			
			if(recordGR.next()){
				fieldsNotToClear.push(ruleGR.getValue('field'));
			}
        }

        var dictionaryGR = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
        dictionaryGR.addQuery('name', table);
        dictionaryGR.addQuery('mandatory', true);
        dictionaryGR.addQuery('active', true);
        dictionaryGR.query();

        while (dictionaryGR.next()) {
            fieldsNotToClear.push(dictionaryGR.getValue('element'));
        }

		return fieldsNotToClear;
    },
    type: "TenonListFIeldsToExclude",
};
